GarlicCoconutScallop.title: George's Favorite
GarlicCoconutScallop.text: Hello there, dear, I hope you are doing well over the farm.^I'm sending you one of my recipes. This dish might not be my favorite, but George is really digging this one.^^ - Evelyn
NauticalScarecrowRecipe.title: A Sunny Craft
NauticalScarecrowRecipe.text: Howdy farmer, ^^I learn of this craft back when I was younger. Pretty sure you can make use of it. I bet it will fit nicely in the sunny Ginger Island.^ -Willy
